message:
So, I've recently started a small company with a friend of mine. We're an awesome duo: he's a really gifted designer, and I'm a touched in the head developer. We're playing around with different platforms and product ideas, just generally trying to find something that people want to pay us for. :)

To that end, we're offering our services to help bootstrap our business. We can do iPhone, Android and web design and development. Our rates are very reasonable, but it really does depend on the scope of the project. 

If we can help anyone out, we'd love to hear from you. I can be reached very easily via chtzr@bouncr.com. Thanks guys!

If you have any interest in working with the twitter api i have a twitter spam application that i'm too busy to have developed that i'd be happy to have you guys build on a 90% equity basis (eg you get 90% i get 10%) it's a pretty quick and dirty project and i have some background getting apps out there google "mytwitterbutler" lol.
You should yield the advice of the wise foremen who have travelled the same road before you. Focius on your startup NOT your side business. You do not need any money to build a prototype.
You would probably make more money working on user testing to find a working business model that will scale larger than your individual fees.
